magicam.name: MagiCam
magicam.description: Allows for the creation of multiple camera objects that can provide advanced scrolling control.

camera0.name: Camera
camera0.desc: Name of the camera to use - leave blank to use the active camera.

transition3.name: Transition
transition3.desc: The type of transition to check for an end to.

transitionısınprogress1.description: Returns true if a specified type of transition is in progress.

camera0.name: Camera
camera0.desc: Name of the camera to use - leave blank to use the active camera.

transition3.name: Transition
transition3.desc: The type of transition to check for.

followobject0.display-text: Camera {0}: Follow {1} with weight of {2} at image point {3}
followobject0.description: Sets the camera to follow an object

camera0.name: Camera
camera0.desc: Name of the camera to use - leave blank to use the active camera.

weight2.name: Weight
weight2.desc: Weight of the object - this effects how much influence the object has on scrolling when there is more than one object being followed.

ımage_point3.name: Image point
ımage_point3.desc: Image point on this object to follow.

setfollowlag1.description: Sets the amount of lag when following a specified object.

camera0.name: Camera
camera0.desc: Name of the camera to use - leave blank to use the active camera.

lag1.name: Lag
lag1.desc: Amount of lag when following an object or group of objects expressed as a value from 0-100.

zoomtocontain2.display-text: Camera {0}: {1} to contain objects with margins of {2}, {3}, zoom bounded between {5} and {4}
zoomtocontain2.description: Tells the camera whether or not to zoom to contain followed objects.

camera0.name: Camera
camera0.desc: Name of the camera to use - leave blank to use the active camera.

zoom3.name: Zoom
zoom3.desc: Determines whether or not the camera will zoom to contain the followed objects.

horizontal_margin4.name: Horizontal margin
horizontal_margin4.desc: The amount of space horizontally between the edge of the farthest object and the edge of the screen.

vertical_margin5.name: Vertical margin
vertical_margin5.desc: The amount of space vertically between the edge of the farthest object and the edge of the screen.

upper_zoom_limit6.name: Upper zoom limit
upper_zoom_limit6.desc: The upper zoom limit. -1 indicates no limit.

lower_zoom_limit7.name: Lower zoom limit
lower_zoom_limit7.desc: The lower zoom limit. -1 indicates no limit.

camera0.name: Camera
camera0.desc: Name of the camera to use - leave blank to use the active camera.

following3.name: Following
following3.desc: Determines whether or not the camera will follow objects

unfollowobject4.description: Sets the camera to un-follow an object

camera0.name: Camera
camera0.desc: Name of the camera to use - leave blank to use the active camera.

createlocalcamera100.display-text: Create local camera {0} at {1}, {2}, with scale {3}, active: {4}
createlocalcamera100.description: Creates a new local camera and attaches associates it with the current layout

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to create.

scale3.name: Scale
scale3.desc: Initial scale(zoom) value of the camera.

active6.name: Active
active6.desc: Determines whether or not the camera is active from the start.

createglobalcamera101.display-text: Create global camera {0} at {1}, {2}, with scale {3}, active: {4}
createglobalcamera101.description: Creates a new global camera and attaches associates it with the current layout

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to create.

scale3.name: Scale
scale3.desc: Initial scale(zoom) value of the camera.

active6.name: Active
active6.desc: Determines whether or not the camera is active from the start.

setactivecamera102.description: Sets the active camera by name.

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to activate.

setscrollsmoothing200.description: Sets the type of smoothing used by the specified camera.

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to modify - leave blank to modify the active camera.

setxposition201.description: Sets the X coordinate of a camera.

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to modify - leave blank to modify the active camera.

setyposition202.description: Sets the Y coordinate of a camera.

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to modify - leave blank to modify the active camera.

setposition203.description: Sets the position of the camera.

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to modify - leave blank to modify the active camera.

setzoom204.description: Sets the zoom level of the camera.

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to modify - leave blank to modify the active camera.

zoom1.name: Zoom
zoom1.desc: Zoom level to set to - 1 is normal level, 2 is double, 0.5 is half, etc.

transitiontopoint300.description: Transitions a camera to a specific point.

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to modify - leave blank to modify the active camera.

duration3.name: Duration
duration3.desc: Duration of the transition in seconds.

transitiontozoom301.display-text: Camera {0}: Transition to zoom level {1} in {2}s
transitiontozoom301.description: Transitions a cameras zoom to a specific level.

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to modify - leave blank to modify the active camera.

zoom1.name: Zoom
zoom1.desc: Zoom level to transition to - 1 is normal level, 2 is double, 0.5 is half, etc.

duration2.name: Duration
duration2.desc: Duration of the transition in seconds.

target_camera0.name: Target camera
target_camera0.desc: Name of the camera to transition to.

duration1.name: Duration
duration1.desc: Duration of the transition in seconds.

shakecamera400.display-text: Camera {0}: Shake with strength {1}, max deviation {2}, max zoom deviation {3}, build length {4}, drop time {5}, duration {6}

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to modify - leave blank to modify the active camera.

strength1.name: Strength
strength1.desc: The strength of the shaking as a value between 0 and 100.

max_deviation2.name: Max deviation
max_deviation2.desc: The maximum amount to deviate from the camera position in pixels.

max_zoom_deviation3.name: Max zoom deviation
max_zoom_deviation3.desc: The maximum amount to deviate from the camera zoom value as a scale factor based at 1.  A value of 0 means no zooming.

build_length4.name: Build length
build_length4.desc: The amount of time to build to max strength in seconds.

drop_time5.name: Drop time
drop_time5.desc: The point in seconds at which to begin dropping off in power.

duration6.name: Duration
duration6.desc: Duration of the shake in seconds.

movementtransitionprogress0.description: Returns the progress of the current movement transition as a number between 0 and 1.

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to retrieve data from.

zoomtransitionprogress1.description: Returns the progress of the current zoom transition as a number between 0 and 1.

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to retrieve data from.

getx2.description: Returns the X position of the specified camera.

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to retrieve data from.

gety3.description: Returns the Y position of the specified camera.

name0.name: Name
name0.desc: Name of the camera to retrieve data from.

getzoom4.description: Returns the zoom level of the specified camera.

getactivecamera5.description: Returns the name of the currently active camera.
